name: Noizz-Formerly Biugo, Photo Video Maker, Hot Video
description: Editors pick: top recommended app by Google Play 2020.  Noizz is the most popular video community and maker in Brazil. On Noizz, short-form videos are spontaneous, positive and life-oriented. Whether you are looking for worlds daily news, adorable pets, exciting sports, or anything can light your day up, Noizz is just the right place. Come and join us to enjoy endless personalized video stream just for you.  Enjoy video feed customized for you Noizz customizes video feeds based on what you watched, liked,and shared. We offer plenty types of videos, brazil samba, football match, comedy, imitation shows, pets, music live, peoples daily life records, best wishes and love affection etc. and everything you may like.  Share interesting videos with your friends on social media You can share your mood and videos to WhatsApp status, Facebook, Instagram, Facebook messenger in no time; Line, Twitter, Youtube and other social media entrance is about to open soon.  Make your fantastic MV with various templates and effects for free 1-click to create a video with templates we offered, show your love & dream, record anniversary & festival, and tell others your memorable moments!  Make yourself electronic photo show in only three steps. Add your featured pictures, select background music and click make button, your own music album will be ready in a few seconds.  Have a try of optimized shooting functon Unlock and have a try of tons of filters, 3D stickers and Noizz original magic music feature that make your picture live. Just enjoy being a pro photographer in your friends.  We are dedicatedly trying our best to give you a better using experience, any of your comments help us make a better Noizz. If you have any suggestion, we are very open to hear it. Feel free to contact us via: noizzreport@gmail.com
